definition: Anki is a digital flashcard application that uses spaced repetition system to help users memorize and review information effectively over time.

Bionic Reading is a concept that combines traditional reading with digital tools to enhance the reading experience and improve comprehension. It involves using techniques such as highlighting, note-taking, and interactive features to engage with the text.

Akaike Information Criterion (AIC) is a statistical measure used for model selection in regression analysis. It balances the goodness of fit of a model with the complexity of the model by penalizing the number of parameters. A lower AIC value indicates a better model fit.
